messages.content: Respond helpfully to the merchant's message

Hey there! CJ here, ready to help with whatever you need. I've been monitoring our support operations - we're currently handling 33 tickets per day with a 3.2-hour average response time and maintaining a solid 4.4 CSAT score.

What can I help you with today? Whether it's diving into specific customer issues, analyzing support patterns, or tackling any operational questions - I'm here and have all our support data at my fingertips.
